document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Dragons in northeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Street of Dragons
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Dragons''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Street of Dragons was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in the northeast section of the city. The road took over for the [[Dragon Trail (Zhentil Keep)|Dragon Trail]] at the [[Dragon Gate]], passing southwest for just {{SI|400|ft|long=yes}} before terminating at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. The Street of Dragons was intersected by [[Border Street]], [[Fortress Street]], and [[Beholder Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[The Eagle of the North]] tavern was located along the Street of Dragons. Also found along this road were a [[Zhentilar]] barracks and guardpost.
